name: Bitten (itch)
description:
Ludum Dare 35 - Shapeshift Jam entry.

72 hour game jam submission

Collaboration team:
Carrie Sloane
Taylor Sechet
Elliott Davis

Featuring music from PILOTPRIEST

I've made an update since the end of the game jam, but things are still not complete.

see the jam entry for more info:
